segments.text: We're ready to order . A cup of coffee for me , and a glass of oranges for her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , how would you like your coffee ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just black coffee . Do you serve anything else besides drinks , say cake .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We also serve sandwiches and cakes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Give me two pieces of cake .
segments.speaker: S1
